title: Was the US Constitution written on lined paper? - Quora
tags: Political History of the United States of America
History of the United States of America
Politics of the United States of America

response.answer_text: It isn’t even written on paper, let alone lined paper. The US constitution is written on parchment. Penmanship was a skill and taught to the upper classes for the couple of centuries before there were keyboards. They really could write that well.
